text: There are times when course and ferine ways, lacking finesse and judgment, are precisely what's needed to win the day.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
An experienced man in the twilight of his life has an opportunity to hand off his best traits to the rising generation.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
There’s simply no substitute for the insight and understanding gained from a life lived on the very bleeding edge.
The character of a Judge must reflect the laws that he represents: clear, fair and consistent.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
In battle, there is no nobility or peasantry. There are only those who win and those who are dead.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
A man will often set altruism aside and act out of self-interest.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
Objects collected along life's winding track may prove vital at some later juncture.
Some deeds – and the men who accomplish them – are the stuff of legend, to be passed down the ages for perpetuity.
There was never a tyrant born on this Earth, but only men who become oppressors by degrees.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
Some characteristics cannot be learned, but instead are bestowed upon the individual before they are even born.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
Nature and nurture, in tandem, define the measure of a man.
The Old Gods smile upon their chosen hero and bestow upon him the gifts needed for success.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]

Whatsoever things are true, honest, just, pure, lovely, of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise... then let him be called a true man of God.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
A passion of knowledge and learning will separate men from beasts.\\n[[col:yellow]] Traits of this type have political consequences [[/col]]
